channel.title: Re release Emopks 508, this was the second pur3z release of it
channel.description:
Please note that I am mod djuice20, I don't remember, which email I used, and since the administration doesn't seem to care I am releasing it on this account.
Hey guy's Mike here and i just wanted my old thread back i found it so know you stupid fucking noobs saying i leeched off somebody can kiss my ass i released this a couple months ago.
This is Pu3z edited a bit.All of the same commads as the regualre pur3z except i took out a couple you ca add them back i took out ::infhp and i added all of the bandos commands and ::givevesta [playername]
some commands
::givemod ::giveadmin ::givevesta ::ipban ::ban ::hourmute ::mute ::unban ::unmute ::givemember ::giverep ::bandarmour ::armadylarmour
Picture time if you want to see any more pics let me know i'll get to it on my next visit.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/1zbw7dt.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/978uxj.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/160ewz8.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/25jl2kw.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2qcdy82.jpg[/img]
http://uppit.com/v/QQS0KMXD
Credits:50% to pur3z 5%to me and 45 to espeon
Hope you guy's enjoy it reasons for me releasing are i feel that i am getting to old to be doing this type of shit know so best of luck to you future codders out there. I am getting tired of fucking seeing leecther's with this shit ahead of my server -.-

item.description:
@tsgh_mike wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:2, topic:402281”]This is great, I haven’t seen a 508 server for awhile now! I might just code it and host it just for the hell of it :P[/quote]Back in its prime of 508s just being released, this held over 70 people on it with no lag, I don’t know for sure how many it can hold.
